page.title: 15Sign of Things to Come (pt2)
page.content: Many businessmen today can run and control their companies from the comfort of their own home. People thought the Sony walkman was clever, well how about the fantastic Japanese T.V. watch? All these rapid Hi-Tec developments are part of the ever expanding computer and machine world. Computers and robots' biggest roll is in industry. In some car factories, cars are made completely by robots- jobs are being replaced because of cheaper and more effective robots- but if your boss were a robot, what would you think? In fact, without computers, we would cease to exist in such a civilised and complex world. But without us, they would never have been created. We exist for each other, but which needs the other more?
